topFaults: Low point drift (bottom moves behind ball)

priorityFix.title: Impact Handle Forward (3-ball line)
priorityFix.how: Place 3 balls in a line. Hit the middle ball while brushing the ground in front of it. Film from face-on. Keep chest over lead thigh at impact.
priorityFix.why: Forces forward low point + stabilizes handle path and face.

p1p9.note: Lead side posts while hands fall
